A cart will bo provided to test the working quali-

FAT CATTLE. 

For best pair fat Steers, or Oxen, 

Second best 
 Best fat Cow, 
 Second best do 
 Best fat Ileifer, 
 Second best do 

do 

do 

$15 
 10 
 8 
 4 

Applicants for premiums for fat cattle must furnish 
 statements of manner of feeding. ' 

The Judges of Fat Cattle will give particular at- 
 tention to the animals submitted to them for exami- 
 nation. It is believed that all other things being 
 equal, those are the best cattle that have the greatest 
 weight in the smallest superficies. The cattle exhi- 
 bited in this class will all be weighed, and the 
 Judges will take measures to give the superficies of 
 each, and publish the result with their reports.
